choice.title: Shorten URL
choice.description: Shorten a URL using the specified shortener. Select an editable URL (e.g., in a web-browser's address field), right-click on it, and it will be shortened using the chosen shortener and copied to the clipboard. To change the shortening service used, edit the workflow.

choice.title: Open Terminal Here
choice.description: Launches Terminal and change to the selected Finder item's directory. If the item is a file, its enclosing folder is used. If it's a package, it's treated as a directory. To change the handling of packages, edit the workflow.

choice.title: Open with TextEdit
choice.description: Open the selected Finder item with TextEdit regardless of its type

requirement.message: Automator Pack requires Mac OS X 10.7 Lion or later
